text: @realDonaldTrump Forty million people have lost their jobs due to your incompetence in handling the coronavirus pandemic and you have the nerve to celebrate additional job losses? You’re just out to destroy our country and come November we’re tossing you out of the White House, you monstrous pos. https://t.co/rEKnx9w3pL
